17 typedef struct {
18  int list_block;
19  int serialno_killed;
20  int serialno;
21  disk_attr_t dattr;
22 } cafs_lite_state_t;
23 
24 typedef struct {
25  const sysfs_t * devfs;
26  const void * dev_cfg;
27  open_file_t * open_file;
28  const char name[NAME_MAX];
29  cafs_lite_state_t * state;
30 } cafs_lite_cfg_t;

33 int cafs_lite_init(const void * cfg); //initialize the filesystem
34 int cafs_lite_mkfs(const void * cfg);

36 int cafs_lite_opendir(const void * cfg, void ** handle, const char * path);
37 int cafs_lite_readdir_r(const void * cfg, void * handle, int loc, struct dirent * entry);
38 int cafs_lite_closedir(const void * cfg, void ** handle);

40 int cafs_lite_fstat(const void * cfg, void * handle, struct stat * stat);
41 int cafs_lite_open(const void * cfg, void ** handle, const char * path, int flags, int mode);
42 int cafs_lite_read(const void * cfg, void * handle, int flags, int loc, void * buf, int nbyte);
43 int cafs_lite_write(const void * cfg, void * handle, int flags, int loc, const void * buf, int nbyte);
44 int cafs_lite_close(const void * cfg, void ** handle);
45 int cafs_lite_remove(const void * cfg, const char * path);
46 int cafs_lite_unlink(const void * cfg, const char * path);

55 #define CAFS_LITE(mount_loc_name, cfgp, access_mode) { \
56  .mount_path = mount_loc_name, \
57  .access = access_mode, \
58  .mount = cafs_lite_init, \
59  .unmount = cafs_lite_unmount, \
60  .ismounted = cafs_lite_ismounted, \
61  .startup = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
62  .mkfs = cafs_lite_mkfs, \
63  .open = cafs_lite_open, \
64  .priv_read = NULL, \
65  .priv_write = NULL, \
66  .read = cafs_lite_read, \
67  .write = cafs_lite_write, \
68  .close = cafs_lite_close, \
69  .priv_ioctl = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
70  .rename = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
71  .unlink = cafs_lite_unlink, \
72  .mkdir = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
73  .rmdir = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
74  .remove = cafs_lite_remove, \
75  .opendir = cafs_lite_opendir, \
76  .closedir = cafs_lite_closedir, \
77  .readdir_r = cafs_lite_readdir_r, \
78  .link = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
79  .symlink = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
80  .stat = cafs_lite_stat, \
81  .lstat = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
82  .fstat = cafs_lite_fstat, \
83  .chmod = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
84  .chown = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
85  .unlock = cafs_lite_unlock, \
86  .cfg = cfgp, \
87 }
